text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Rejected…… for real……? Eh…… I seriously got rejected again……?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… that one looked fatal.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Blown away by the wind. These dark clouds won't dissipate easily——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——BUT NEVAGIVUP! !

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: ——eh?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Maybe I shoulda used giant party crackers! ? But there was no time～～! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I gotta try again for Princess——

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Stop stop! ! Stop, Helios! ! Giant party crackers are super loud! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eeeh～! ? Pwetty Pwease ♡

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: That's not it……! Besides, aren't you trying to appeal the wrong way?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: If you really want to be Ruby's date, you gotta consider her feelings more.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I think that's what's most important when choosing a date. ……It was the same for me too.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——! Bamboo too……?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Me too…… I had to face her seriously. On that day, when I danced with my biggest rival……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Oguri-senpai and I, we pitted our souls against each other…… I wanted our passionate rivalry to grow even stronger.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Facing each other, and dancing together…… I think we accomplished that. The two of us really felt like destined rivals.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: That passionate dance, it's a precious memory……!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Everyone has things precious to them! By sharing them with your partner, a strong bond can be born! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ———Bamboo.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Helios…….

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——I don't get it! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Ehーー! ? Were you even listening! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: But like, it's kinda complicated! Really tho, I'm serious too!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I really wanna dance with Ruby! ! Ruby's my special girl! ! I wanna have fun with her!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: That's what dancing's all about! Bamcham had fun dancing with Ogurin too right! ?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… it was really fun. With Oguri-senpai, I worked hard, took the lead, and danced our hearts out……!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: It was hot……and fun……! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Right! ? I want that with my Princess too!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: So I won't give up! I'll try as many times as I have to! ! Then have fun with the Princess! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best performance! Then we'll get best daaaaaaaateーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Having fun together…… those are your feelings……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ——UOOOOOOOOOOH! ! I'M INSPIRED!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Having fun together, dancing your heart out……! Those are such passionate feeling! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Helios! ! In that case, I'll help you! Youth is about making your passionate feelings come true, together!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ——fufu, that's right. I also understand that feeling, ……wanting to dance with someone special.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: So let's make it come true, together. ———right, Miracle-san.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'm sure Helios and Ruby can win best date together.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Helios' passion always lifts us up. I'm sure it'll be the same for Ruby as well.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ～～～～! ! Thanks y'all! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Alrighty, let's have a strategy meeting! ! Thankies! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: So, how are you going to make it fun for Ruby? We have to respect Ruby's goals as well……

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Hmm……Wouldn't Helios' ability to "have fun" help them win votes for best date?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: We just need a way to prove that to Ruby-san.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… you're right. Rather than just talking about Helios' energy, it'll be better to show her they can win!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Gotcha! ! Okay! ! Let's show my ladyーー! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ……You're sure to perform better when you're having fun, right? We should show that, if you have fun together, you can win.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——Ah! ? Really! ? ! ? So just show how much fun it'll be! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Then……bamboo! ! Be my Droite producer! We'll make it the funnest Droite ever! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: So like, we'll do rehearsals right? Then invite my princess! We'll show her the funnest dance on the funnest stage ever!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ……I see. A stage where everyone can have fun, and prove that it'll shine the brightest.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeah. That's what I wanna show her. If we have fun, we'll definitely win best date.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ——I'll be the greatest best date escort! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Hmm……that's pretty hot huh. Alright then, let's do this together! A Droite where everyone can have fun! !
Yeah☆ Yeeeah!!
